sentences.sContent: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.sCn: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

sentences.sContent: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.sCn: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

sentences.sContent: She has lived alone in this house for almost five years now.
sentences.sCn: 她现在已经独自在这所房子里住了差不多五年了。

sentences.sContent: ...such as a worried man alone in a tiny rowboat...
...the article says innovative ideas alone do not ensure success...
...playing computers alone isolates people from others...
...alone or in groups of two or three...
...a college degree alone does not guarantee a good job for its holder...
...recently told me that a college degree alone is no longer a guarantor of a good job...
...you are better off working alone than practicing with other people...
...but need-based aid alone will be awarded beginning with students entering in fall 2008...

phrases.pCn: 独自生活；一个人住；单独居住
不打扰；不干涉；不管；不理

trans.tranOther: if you are alone in a place, there is no one with you
without any help from other people
